meta.title: About Us | TUF
meta.description: Learn more about The Universal Forums (TUF) - A community-driven organization for ADOFAI custom levels

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.content: The Universal Forums (TUF) is a community-driven organization dedicated to collecting, rating, and organizing custom levels for A Dance of Fire and Ice (ADOFAI). Our platform serves as a central hub for players to share their achievements, discover new levels, and connect with fellow enthusiasts.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.intro: We strive to create a comprehensive and accessible platform that:
points: Provides accurate difficulty ratings for custom levels
Fosters a supportive community for players

accuracy.title: Accuracy
accuracy.content: We maintain high standards for level ratings and scoring to ensure fair competition.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.content: Our rating processes and community decisions are open and clear to all members.

inclusivity.title: Inclusivity
inclusivity.content: We welcome players of all skill levels and backgrounds to join our community.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.content: We continuously improve our platform to better serve the ADOFAI community.
